mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_relation ( relation_id, source_point_id, target_point_id, relation_type, created_at ) VALUES ( #{relationId}, #{sourcePointId}, #{targetPointId}, #{relationType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM knowledge_relation WHERE source_point_id = #{pointId} OR target_point_id = #{pointId}
DELETE FROM knowledge_relation WHERE source_point_id = #{sourceId} AND target_point_id = #{targetId}
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT source_point_id, target_point_id FROM knowledge_relation WHERE source_point_id = #{targetId} UNION ALL SELECT r.source_point_id, r.target_point_id FROM knowledge_relation r INNER JOIN cte ON cte.target_point_id = r.source_point_id ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cte WHERE target_point_id = #{sourceId}
